text: Jozef "Jos" Van Riel (16 November 1943 – 19 January 2023) was a Belgian footballer who played as a right-back defender. ==Biography== Van Riel started playing football in . He later played in Kalmthout and afterwards at Sportkring Sint-Niklaas in Sint-Niklaas and at K.F.C. Diest in Diest. In 1973 he signed a contract with Royal Antwerp F.C.. He played for the team 99 matches in the Belgian Pro League, the Belgian Cup and in UEFA Europa League matches. Playing as a defender he had shirt number one and still scored eight league goals. In his first two seasons, he became vice champion of Belgium at the 1973–74 Belgian First Division and 1974–75 Belgian First Division. In its third and last year he finished with the team eleventh at the 1975–76 Belgian First Division. In 1975 he was on the team during the 1974-75 Belgian Cup where they lost from R.S.C. Anderlecht with 1-0. Van Riel died on 19 January 2023, at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Belgian footballers Category:1943 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Place of death missing
title: Jos Van Riel
